alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McDuffie, southwestern Columbia, northwestern Burke and southwestern Richmond Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warrenton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Fort Gordon, Hephzibah, Harlem, Blythe, Dearing, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Liberty Park Community Center, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Bath-Edie, Thomson Fire Department, Pea Patch Aerodrome, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, Autney and Boneville. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 181 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
